name: Athel

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally HP in all Battles by 15%.

skills.name: Strike Down
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Has a 75% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns on the last hit.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Damage +5%
Lvl. 7 Damage +5%
Lvl. 8 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Divine Blades
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has an extra 15% chance of inflicting a critical hit.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Higher Blessing
skills.raw_description:
Places a 25% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. Places a 30% [Increase DEF] buff on this Champion if this Champion's current HP is less than 50%. Gains an Extra Turn.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
